input.sentences: the children are all dressed up for trick or treating tonight .
some of kids are dressed up in dresses and colorful clothing .
he is gathering all the kids up to go door and door for candy .
the kids are gather in the living room .

output.sentences: I love seeing all the kids dressed in their best dresses.
Some adults don't know how to feel about kids gathering at their front door.
I think it's the best when kids gather in their living rooms for pictures.
Of course they will want to trick-or-treating at my place because it is the scariest houses on the street.
